.. _catalog:

=======================================
Star catalogs (``ctapointing.catalog``)
=======================================

.. currentmodule:: ctapointing.catalog

The `ctapointing.catalog` module provides access to astrometric information from the bright star and GAIA catalogs.
In particular, it provides functionality to obtain a list of stars within a certain angular distance to a given ICRS
position, with proper magnitude limits.

API
===

.. automodapi:: ctapointing.catalog
